verses.verse: <S%G1352>Therefore<s%> you are <S%G379>without<s%> <S%G379>excuse,<s%> <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G444>man<s%> [of you] who <S%G2919>passes<s%> <S%G2919>judgment,<s%> for in that you <S%G2919>judge<s%> <S%G2087>another,<s%> you <S%G2632>condemn<s%> <S%G4572>yourself;<s%> for you who <S%G2919>judge<s%> <S%G4238>practice<s%> the <S%G846>same<s%> <S%G846>things.<s%>

And we <S%G3609>know<s%> that the <S%G2917>judgment<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G2596>rightly<s%> <S%G225><s%> <S%G1510>falls<s%> upon <S%G3588>those<s%> who <S%G4238>practice<s%> <S%G5108>such<s%> <S%G5108>things.<s%>

And do you <S%G3049>suppose<s%> <S%G3778>this,<s%> <S%G5599>O<s%> <S%G444>man,<s%> when you <S%G2919>pass<s%> <S%G2919>judgment<s%> upon <S%G3588>those<s%> who <S%G4238>practice<s%> <S%G5108>such<s%> <S%G5108>things<s%> and <S%G4160>do<s%> the <S%G846>same<s%> [yourself,] that you will <S%G1628>escape<s%> the <S%G2917>judgment<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>?

<S%G2228>Or<s%> do you <S%G2706>think<s%> <S%G2706>lightly<s%> of the <S%G4149>riches<s%> of His <S%G5544>kindness<s%> and <S%G463>forbearance<s%> and <S%G3115>patience,<s%> not <S%G50>knowing<s%> that the <S%G5543>kindness<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G71>leads<s%> you to <S%G3341>repentance<s%>?

But <S%G2596>because<s%> of your <S%G4643>stubbornness<s%> and <S%G279>unrepentant<s%> <S%G2588>heart<s%> you are <S%G2343>storing<s%> up <S%G3709>wrath<s%> for <S%G4572>yourself<s%> in the <S%G2250>day<s%> of <S%G3709>wrath<s%> and <S%G602>revelation<s%> of the <S%G1341>righteous<s%> <S%G1341>judgment<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%>
<S%G3739>who<s%> will <S%G591>render<s%> to <S%G1538>every<s%> <S%G1538>man<s%> <S%G2596>according<s%> to his deeds: <S%G2041><s%>

to <S%G3588>those<s%> who by <S%G5281>perseverance<s%> in <S%G2041>doing<s%> <S%G18>good<s%> <S%G2212>seek<s%> for <S%G1391>glory<s%> and <S%G5092>honor<s%> and <S%G861>immortality,<s%> <S%G166>eternal<s%> <S%G2222>life;<s%>

but to <S%G3588>those<s%> who are <S%G2052>selfishly<s%> <S%G2052>ambitious<s%> and do not <S%G544>obey<s%> the <S%G225>truth,<s%> but <S%G3982>obey<s%> <S%G93>unrighteousness,<s%> <S%G3709>wrath<s%> and <S%G2372>indignation.<s%>

[There will be] <S%G2347>tribulation<s%> and <S%G4730>distress<s%> for <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G5590>soul<s%> of <S%G444>man<s%> who <S%G2716>does<s%> <S%G2556>evil,<s%> of the <S%G2453>Jew<s%> <S%G4413>first<s%> and <S%G5037>also<s%> of the <S%G1672>Greek,<s%>

but <S%G1391>glory<s%> and <S%G5092>honor<s%> and <S%G1515>peace<s%> to <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G3956>man<s%> who <S%G2038>does<s%> <S%G18>good,<s%> to the <S%G2453>Jew<s%> <S%G4413>first<s%> and <S%G5037>also<s%> to the <S%G1672>Greek.<s%>
For there is <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G4382>partiality<s%> with <S%G2316>God.<s%>

For <S%G3745>all<s%> <S%G3745>who<s%> have <S%G264>sinned<s%> <S%G460>without<s%> the <S%G460>Law<s%> will <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G622>perish<s%> <S%G460>without<s%> the <S%G460>Law;<s%> and <S%G3745>all<s%> <S%G3745>who<s%> have <S%G264>sinned<s%> <S%G1722>under<s%> the <S%G3551>Law<s%> will be <S%G2919>judged<s%> by the <S%G3551>Law;<s%>
for not the <S%G202>hearers<s%> of the <S%G3551>Law<s%> are <S%G1342>just<s%> <S%G3844>before<s%> <S%G2316>God,<s%> but the <S%G4163>doers<s%> of the <S%G3551>Law<s%> will be <S%G1344>justified.<s%>

For <S%G3752>when<s%> <S%G1484>Gentiles<s%> who do not <S%G2192>have<s%> the <S%G3551>Law<s%> <S%G4160>do<s%> <S%G5449>instinctively<s%> the things of the <S%G3551>Law,<s%> <S%G3778>these,<s%> not <S%G2192>having<s%> the <S%G3551>Law,<s%> are a <S%G3551>law<s%> to <S%G1438>themselves,<s%>

in that they <S%G1731>show<s%> the <S%G2041>work<s%> of the <S%G3551>Law<s%> <S%G1123>written<s%> in their <S%G2588>hearts,<s%> their <S%G4893>conscience<s%> <S%G4828>bearing<s%> <S%G4828>witness,<s%> and their <S%G3053>thoughts<s%> <S%G3342>alternately<s%> <S%G2723>accusing<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G2532>else<s%> <S%G626>defending<s%> them,

on the <S%G2250>day<s%> <S%G3739>when,<s%> <S%G2596>according<s%> to my <S%G2098>gospel,<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> will <S%G2919>judge<s%> the <S%G2927>secrets<s%> of <S%G444>men<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus.<s%>
But <S%G1487>if<s%> you <S%G2028>bear<s%> the <S%G2028>name<s%> <S%G2453>"Jew,<s%>" and <S%G1879>rely<s%> upon the <S%G3551>Law,<s%> and <S%G2744>boast<s%> in <S%G2316>God,<s%>
and <S%G1097>know<s%> [His] <S%G2307>will,<s%> and <S%G1381>approve<s%> the things that are <S%G1308>essential,<s%> being <S%G2727>instructed<s%> out of the <S%G3551>Law,<s%>
and are <S%G3982>confident<s%> that you <S%G4572>yourself<s%> are a <S%G3595>guide<s%> to the <S%G5185>blind,<s%> a <S%G5457>light<s%> to <S%G3588>those<s%> who are in <S%G4655>darkness,<s%>

a <S%G3810>corrector<s%> of the <S%G878>foolish,<s%> a <S%G1320>teacher<s%> of the <S%G3516>immature,<s%> <S%G2192>having<s%> in the <S%G3551>Law<s%> the <S%G3446>embodiment<s%> of <S%G1108>knowledge<s%> and of the <S%G225>truth,<s%>

you, <S%G3767>therefore,<s%> who <S%G1321>teach<s%> <S%G2087>another,<s%> do you not <S%G1321>teach<s%> <S%G4572>yourself<s%>? You who <S%G2784>preach<s%> that one should not <S%G2813>steal,<s%> do you <S%G2813>steal<s%>?

You who <S%G3004>say<s%> that one should not <S%G3431>commit<s%> <S%G3431>adultery,<s%> do you <S%G3431>commit<s%> <S%G3431>adultery<s%>? You who <S%G948>abhor<s%> <S%G1497>idols,<s%> do you <S%G2416>rob<s%> <S%G2416>temples<s%>?
You <S%G3739>who<s%> <S%G2744>boast<s%> in the <S%G3551>Law,<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> your <S%G3847>breaking<s%> the <S%G3551>Law,<s%> do you <S%G818>dishonor<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%>?
For "the <S%G3686>name<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> is <S%G987>blasphemed<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> the <S%G1484>Gentiles<s%> <S%G1223>because<s%> of you," <S%G2531>just<s%> as it is <S%G1125>written.<s%>

For <S%G3303>indeed<s%> <S%G4061>circumcision<s%> is of <S%G5623>value,<s%> <S%G1437>if<s%> you <S%G4238>practice<s%> the <S%G3551>Law;<s%> but <S%G1437>if<s%> you are a <S%G3848>transgressor<s%> of the <S%G3551>Law,<s%> your <S%G4061>circumcision<s%> has <S%G1096>become<s%> <S%G203>uncircumcision.<s%>

<S%G1437>If<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> the <S%G203>uncircumcised<s%> <S%G203>man<s%> <S%G5442>keeps<s%> the <S%G1345>requirements<s%> of the <S%G3551>Law,<s%> will not his <S%G203>uncircumcision<s%> be <S%G3049>regarded<s%> as <S%G4061>circumcision<s%>?

And will not he who is <S%G5449>physically<s%> <S%G203>uncircumcised,<s%> if he <S%G5055>keeps<s%> the <S%G3551>Law,<s%> will he not <S%G2919>judge<s%> you <S%G3588>who<s%> <S%G1223>though<s%> having the <S%G1121>letter<s%> [of the <S%G3551>Law<s%>] and <S%G4061>circumcision<s%> are a <S%G3848>transgressor<s%> of the Law?

For he is not a <S%G2453>Jew<s%> <S%G3588>who<s%> is one <S%G1722>outwardly<s%><S%G5318>;<s%> <S%G3761>neither<s%> is <S%G4061>circumcision<s%> that which is <S%G5318>outward<s%> in the <S%G4561>flesh.<s%>

But he is a <S%G2453>Jew<s%> <S%G3588>who<s%> is one <S%G2927>inwardly;<s%> and <S%G4061>circumcision<s%> is that which is of the <S%G2588>heart,<s%> by the <S%G4151>Spirit,<s%> not by the <S%G1121>letter;<s%> and his <S%G1868>praise<s%> is not from <S%G444>men,<s%> but from <S%G2316>God.<s%>
